text: RAG or RAGS may refer to: ==Academia== *Royal Galician Academy (Real Academia Galega) ==Companies== *RAG Aktiengesellschaft coal mining group, Herne, Germany *Rohöl-Aufsuchungs Aktiengesellschaft, an Austrian oil and gas company ==Other== *RAG, a traffic light rating system *Recombination-activating gene, encoding enzymes RAG-1 and RAG-2 *Rag complex GTPase *Ruhrpott AG, a German hip hop group *RAGS International, later Messiah Foundation International ==See also== *Rag (disambiguation)
title: RAG
